languages.text: "Чудно! Я отдам нужные указания. Придется немного обождать, но уверяю — и вы, и ваша спутница найдете сегодняшний вечер незабываемым!"

traits.locale_text: "Чудно! Я отдам все нужные указания и распоряжения. Придется немного обождать, но уверяю — и вы, и ваша спутница найдете сегодняшний вечер незабываемым!"

languages.text: "Fabulous! I shall see to all the arrangements. There will be a short wait, but I assure you: both you and your companion will find this evening unforgettable!"
languages.original_text: "Чудно! Я отдам нужные указания. Придется немного обождать, но уверяю — и вы, и ваша спутница найдете сегодняшний вечер незабываемым!"

traits.locale_text: "Fabulous! I will see to all the arrangements. It will be a short wait, but I assure you: both you and your companion will find this evening unforgettable!"
"Fabulous! I will see to all the arrangements. It will be a short wait, but I assure you: both you and your companion will find this evening unforgettable!"
"Fabulous! I shall see to all the arrangements. There will be a short wait, but I assure you: both you and your companion will find this evening unforgettable!"
"Fabulous! I shall see to all the arrangements. There will be a short wait, but I assure you: both you and your companion will find this evening unforgettable!"
"Fabulous! I shall see to all the arrangements. There will be a short wait, but I assure you: both you and your companion will find this evening unforgettable!"
"Fabulous! I shall see to all the arrangements. There will be a short wait, but I assure you: both you and your companion will find this evening unforgettable!"

languages.text: "Fabelhaft! Ich leite alles in die Wege. Ihr werdet ein kleines Weilchen warten müssen, doch ich versichere Euch: Ihr und Eure Begleitung erlebt einen unvergesslichen Abend!"
languages.original_text: "Fabulous! I shall see to all the arrangements. There will be a short wait, but I assure you: both you and your companion will find this evening unforgettable!"

traits.locale_text: "Fabelhaft! Ich leite alles in die Wege. Ihr werdet ein kleines Weilchen warten müssen, doch ich versichere Euch: Ihr und Eure Begleitung erlebt einen unvergesslichen Abend!"

languages.text: «¡Fabuloso! Me encargaré de todos los preparativos. Deberá esperar momentáneamente, pero se lo aseguro: ¡tanto usted como su acompañante considerarán esta velada inolvidable!».
languages.original_text: "Fabulous! I shall see to all the arrangements. There will be a short wait, but I assure you: both you and your companion will find this evening unforgettable!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Fabuloso! Me encargaré de todos los preparativos. Deberá esperar momentáneamente, pero se lo aseguro: ¡tanto usted como su acompañante considerarán esta velada inolvidable!».

languages.text: 「素敵ですね！手配はすべて私がします。少しお時間をいただきますが、お約束しますよ。閣下もお相手の方も、この夜が忘れられない思い出となることでしょう！」
languages.original_text: "Fabulous! I shall see to all the arrangements. There will be a short wait, but I assure you: both you and your companion will find this evening unforgettable!"

traits.locale_text: 「素敵ですね！手配はすべて私がします。少しお時間をいただきますが、お約束しますよ。閣下もお相手の方も、この夜が忘れられない思い出となることでしょう！」

languages.text: “太棒了！我会把所有事情都安排好。虽然要稍微等一会儿，不过我可以向您保证，您和您的伴侣将会充分享受这个难忘的夜晚！”
languages.original_text: "Fabulous! I shall see to all the arrangements. There will be a short wait, but I assure you: both you and your companion will find this evening unforgettable!"

traits.locale_text: “太棒了！我会把所有事情都安排好。虽然要稍微等一会儿，不过我可以向您保证，您和您的伴侣将会充分享受这个难忘的夜晚！”

languages.text: « Fabuleux ! Je m'occupe de tout. Il vous faudra patienter quelques instants, mais permettez-moi de vous assurer que votre compagne et vous passerez une soirée inoubliable ! »
languages.original_text: "Fabulous! I shall see to all the arrangements. There will be a short wait, but I assure you: both you and your companion will find this evening unforgettable!"

traits.locale_text: « Fabuleux ! Je m'occupe de tout. Il vous faudra patienter quelques instants, mais permettez-moi de vous assurer que votre compagne et vous passerez une soirée inoubliable ! »

languages.text: "Muhteşem! Tüm hazırlıklarla ilgileneceğim. Kısa bir süre bekletebilirim ama sizi temin ederim ki hem siz hem de yoldaşınız, bu geceyi hafızalarınıza kazıyacaksınız!"
languages.original_text: "Fabulous! I shall see to all the arrangements. There will be a short wait, but I assure you: both you and your companion will find this evening unforgettable!"
